20101214180802.667|20101214180804.333|CCO|HOUSE.
20101214180804.333|20101214180806.000|CCO|THEY HAVE A HISTORY OF GETTING 
20101214180806.000|20101214180807.667|CCO|INVOLVED IN CONTROVERSIAL,
